name: Wack City
description:
WACK CITY:

A modern city RPG where you decide what path you take.

With 3 distinct endings and more on the way, you can also choose to go your own way. Will you be the richest businessman in the city? Will you rob banks to make ends meet? You and your character decide.

There's lots to do in this strange world, and we hope you can experience it all before your impending death.
